title: Crocodile attack bride speaks of her ordeal
text:
Crocodile attack bride speaks of her ordeal 6:10pm IST - 01:05
A crocodile attacked Zanele Ndlovu as she canoed with her fiancé in Zimbabwe, ripping her arm so badly it had to be amputated. But the pair, due to marry just five days later, refused to allow the trauma to delay the ceremony. Scarlett Cvitanovich reports.
